process: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl. Add butter and eggs and mix until smooth. Pour into a loaf pan and bake at 180 degrees for 40 minutes.
name: Vanilla Pound Cake
ingredients: Flour (250g), Sugar (200g), Baking powder (1 tsp), Butter (200g), Eggs (3)

process: Combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, and milk. Pour the mixture into a muffin tray and bake at 180 degrees for 20 minutes.
name: Chocolate Muffins
ingredients: Flour (200g), Sugar (150g), Cocoa powder (50g), Baking powder (1 tsp), Milk (200ml)

process: Mix rolled oats, honey, and melted butter. Press the mixture into a baking dish and bake at 160 degrees for 25 minutes until golden.
name: Oat Bars

process: Mix flour, yeast, sugar, salt, and water to form a dough. Let rise for 1 hour, then bake at 200 degrees for 25 minutes.
name: Rustic Bread
ingredients: Flour (500g), Yeast (7g), Sugar (1 tsp), Salt (1 tsp), Water (300ml)

process: Whisk eggs and sugar until fluffy. Add flour and vanilla extract. Pour into a pan and bake at 180 degrees for 20 minutes.
name: Vanilla Sponge Cake
ingredients: Eggs (4), Sugar (150g), Flour (100g), Vanilla extract (1 tsp)

process: Combine apples, sugar, and cinnamon. Place in a baking dish and cover with a mix of oats, butter, and sugar. Bake at 180 degrees for 30 minutes.
name: Apple Crumble
ingredients: Apples (4), Sugar (100g), Cinnamon (1 tsp), Oats (100g), Butter (100g)

process: Mix cream cheese, sugar, and eggs. Pour over a graham cracker crust and bake at 160 degrees for 40 minutes.
name: Cheesecake
ingredients: Cream cheese (400g), Sugar (150g), Eggs (3), Graham crackers (200g)

process: Combine flour, butter, sugar, and water to form a dough. Roll out and place in a pie dish. Add filling and bake at 180 degrees for 35 minutes.
name: Fruit Pie
ingredients: Flour (250g), Butter (150g), Sugar (50g), Water (2 tbsp), Fruit filling (500g)
